remarks: Double exponents in a power mod calculation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 21-Feb-2014.)
statement:
modxai.1 $e |- N e. NN $.
modxai.2 $e |- A e. NN $.
modxai.3 $e |- B e. NN0 $.
modxai.4 $e |- D e. ZZ $.
modxai.5 $e |- K e. NN0 $.
modxai.6 $e |- M e. NN0 $.
mod2xi.9 $e |- ( ( A ^ B ) mod N ) = ( K mod N ) $.
mod2xi.7 $e |- ( 2 x. B ) = E $.
mod2xi.8 $e |- ( ( D x. N ) + M ) = ( K x. K ) $.
mod2xi $p |- ( ( A ^ E ) mod N ) = ( M mod N ) $.
